artefact.overview: Book, change and cancel approved driving instructor (ADI) part 1 tests for your trainee instructors using the trainer booking facility
artefact.more_information:
You’ll also need the following from the Driving Standards Agency:

- business ID
- username
- password

You can book test slots up to 3 months in advance. You won’t have to give the candidate’s details when you book the tests.

% You must confirm the details of the candidate taking the test by 4pm a full working day before the test, eg by 4pm on Wednesday if the test is on Friday. %

^ Sundays and public holidays are not counted as working days. ^

##Cancel or change a test

You must give at least 3 clear working days notice when cancelling or changing a test to get a refund.
artefact.introduction: Book and manage the approved driving instructor part 1 test for your trainee instructors. You’ll need to be [registered to use the trainer booking facility](/register-to-book-driving-tests-as-trainer-or-business "Register as DSA trainer booker") for theory tests.
